content.headline: Joby Announces ‘ElevateOS’ Software Suite for Air Taxi Operations
content.summary: SANTA CRUZ, Calif., June 20, 2024--Joby Aviation, Inc. (NYSE:JOBY), a company developing electric air taxis for commercial passenger service, today announced it has received Federal Aviation Administration ("FAA") authorization to use a suite of software tools developed in-house, called ‘ElevateOS’, that are designed to enable high-tempo, on-demand air taxi operations.

content.headline: Joby Acquires Xwing Autonomy Division, Looks Ahead to Autonomous Flight
content.summary: SANTA CRUZ, Calif., June 04, 2024--Joby Aviation, Inc. (NYSE:JOBY), a company developing electric air taxis for commercial passenger service, today announced the acquisition of the autonomy division of Xwing Inc., an industry leader in the development of autonomous technology for aviation.
